Standard

\begin{eqnarray*}
\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}x^{2}dx & = & \infty\\
\\
\begin{bmatrix}\frac{f(x,t)}{x} & \frac{f\left(x,t\right)}{x+\Delta x}\\
\frac{f\left(x,t\right)}{t} & \frac{f\left(x,t\right)}{t+\Delta t}
\end{bmatrix} & = & \frac{\delta f\left(x,t\right)}{\delta x},\frac{\delta f\left(x,t\right)}{\delta t}
\end{eqnarray*}
